title: 7.1.5 Write AWS connection tests with mocked STS
body:
## Parent Issue
#29 - 7.1 AWS Account Connection

## Objective
Write comprehensive tests for AWS connection functionality.

## Test Coverage
- Role ARN validation
- Credential encryption/decryption
- STS assume_role mocking
- Permission verification
- API endpoints

## Files to Create
- `tests/services/test_aws_connection.py`
- `tests/api/test_aws_api.py`

## Estimated Time: 2 hours
